Leonardo Vision XL.description: 適合寫實風格的圖片生成，特別適合人物和場景

classroom_study.prompt: Two students studying in a bright, sunlit classroom. They are sitting at wooden desks, surrounded by books and notebooks. The atmosphere is peaceful and focused. Natural light streams through large windows, creating a warm and inviting environment. The scene is captured in a photorealistic style with soft lighting and detailed textures.
classroom_study.negative_prompt: dark, gloomy, blurry, distorted faces, unrealistic proportions
